You are poisoned by Hemlock, so you can\'t do that. Go back to HQ to get better.

your Shady Grove
HQ
Not enough Vine Cred to build a Shady Grove.
You built a Shady Grove, your first sappy sleuthing headquarters.
You cured your poison at the HQ. Now you feel as spry as a Sequoia!
You don\'t have the %d Intel required to upgrade your HQ.
Catch that agent!
You found the double agent! Chase it!
The double agent got away. Maybe we can find it again?
You caught the double agent!
a Seedy Sapling
Sapling
%s with %d Secrets ready for you
You persuaded the Seedy Sapling to be your informant for %d Vine Cred.
You need at least %d Vine Cred to make this sapling your informant.
You sleuthed %d Secrets from the Sapling.
This Seedy Sapling is stumped for now. Come back later.
an Analyst Aspen with no leads
an Analyst Aspen working on your lead
Aspen
The Analyst Aspen found its first lead to analyze for your %d Vine Cred and %d Secrets.
You need at least %d Vine Cred and %d Secrets to get the Aspen its first lead.
After analyzing your %d Secrets, the Aspen gives you %d Intel.
You need %d Secrets for the Aspen to analyze for Intel.
One of your Analyst Aspens lost their lead after too long with no new Secrets.
a Hemlock Haven
Hemlock
A Hemlock begins chasing you! Run away! Quick!
You outran the Hemlock. Whew! Good work.
The Hemlock caught you and poisoned you. Go back to HQ to get better.
The Hemlock is chasing you, run fast!
You got more Vine Cred!
Vine Cred!
You have discovered %s!
You have %d Vine Cred
You have no Vine Cred
%d Secrets
%d Intel
You are approaching %s.
Hello Agent Almond. I\'m a complex artificially intelligent holographic lifeform. But you can call me Holly for short.
To build the Shady Grove, our first headquarters, double-click somewhere.
We need %d Vine Cred before we can set up the Shady Grove. Walk or jog around the neighborhood to get Vine Cred. You will hear this sound when you collect a Vine Cred.
You have enough Vine Cred for your first headquarters, the Shady Grove. Choose a central location to build your headquarters and double-click to build it.
Now that we\'ve grown our Shady Grove, let\'s go investigate the area. Try double-clicking to upgrade or build and clicking to interact with every site you discover.
Nice work finding a Seedy Sapling. Can we turn it to our side?
I\'m glad that Seedy Sapling is working for us now.
Now we have Secrets, but we need to find a way to understand them.
I\'m picking up strange signals from HQ. Take that Intel back to the Shady Grove and upgrade it!
You\'ve been poisoned. Go back to HQ for antidote.
and
Nice work, Agent Almond! It\'s a Dogwood double agent. We need to find out what this means for the Oaken Empire. I\'ll send the debriefing to your mobile device.
saved_pace
magnolia_medals
%dx Magnolia Medals

As Agent Almond, a new recruit of the Oaken Empire, you ensure any arborous threats to the Empire are well-researched and that seedy schemes never blossom.\nThere are rumors of a double agent in the Tangle Woods. Your first mission is to plant a headquarters there and root out the opposing spy.

You managed to catch the double agent. The agent is part of a crop of rogues named the Dogwood Derelicts. We need to figure out why this treacherous tree was spying on the Oaken Empire and strip the bark off this conspiracy. But first, you deserve your reward. -Holly
